Name: Rise From The Grave
Effect: Once per game, after being KO'ed, Ghouliath revives after 3 turns.

Name: Split The Pot
Effect: When Doing Nothing, Embursa heals all other non-KO'ed mons for 1/16th of max HP.

Name: Actus Reus
Effect: If Malalien KO's an opposing mon, they gain an Indictment. Upon KO, if they have an Indictment, Malalien cripples their murderer.

Name: Intrinsic Value
Effect: At the end of every turn, Iblivion resets all negative stat changes. If any negative stat changes were reset, gain a Baselight level.

Name: Carrot Harvest
Effect: At the end of every turn, Sofabbi has a 1/2 chance of regaining 1 stamina.

Name: Post-Workout
Effect: On swap out, automatically heal from certain status conditions. If healed, Pengym regains 1 stamina.

Name: Angery
Effect: Each time Gorillax takes damage, they get Angerier. At 3 stacks (Angeriest), they heal for 1/6 of max HP.

Name: Overclock
Effect: When Volthare swaps in, the battlefield becomes Stormy. Storm lasts for 3 turns, boosts friendly mons' speed by 25%, and decreases their SpDEF by 25%.

Name: Interweaving
Effect: When Inutia swaps in, the opposing mon's ATK decreases 10%. When Inutia swaps out, the opposing mon's SpATK decreases 10%.
